present: At this very moment, he vigorously sprints through the bustling streets, heart pounding with each powerful stride forward.
Right now, as we speak, she enthusiastically devours her meal with unmatched intensity and focused determination.
past: Long ago, in distant memories, he had vigorously sprinted through those now-empty streets, his footsteps echoing through time.
Yesterday, in moments now forever gone, she had enthusiastically devoured that final meal, unaware of its significance.
